articles.description: The ‘cashless everywhere facility’ will allow policyholders to avail cashless option at any hospital. Until now, policyholders treated in hospitals that were not part of their insurers' networks had to pay bills themselves and claim reimbursements later.
articles.content:
Health insurance policyholders will now have a wider cashless network of hospitals to choose from, when they have to undergo treatment, and even surgeries.
What makes this possible is the rolling ou… [+348 chars]

articles.title: Flipkart dominates with 48% market share, Meesho emerges as fastest growing - Mint
articles.description: Walmart's subsidiary Flipkart commands a 48% market share in the Indian e-commerce sector, growing faster than the industry.
articles.content: Walmart's subsidiary Flipkart continues to assert its dominance in the e-commerce sector, commanding a 48% market share, reported PTI, citing the AllianceBernstein report. Meesho, backed by SoftBank,… [+3424 chars]
